5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Qabisah bin Hulb that his father said:“The Prophet (ﷺ) used to lead us in prayer, and he would take hold of his left hand with his right.”

chapter.ara-name: باب وَضْعِ الْيَمِينِ عَلَى الشِّمَالِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Placing the right hand on the left during Prayer
